body.p:
North Middletown Ky
Decr. 5th 1860.
His Excellency
Honl. B. Magoffin

I am informed by B. F. Harris, our present Magistrate, that he will resign, to you, his office as such -- I would reccommend the appointment of John B. Stivers -- He is a gentleman of fine Judgment, and his political record is a good one -- He served in the Mexican War

I have the honor to
be Yr Excellencys
Most Obt Servt
A. Frank Brown

Bourbon Co.
J. P.
District No 4.
Jno. B. Stivers
vice
B. F. Harris.
Issd Dec. 10 1860
